thread.title: What to watch: Your weekend racing schedule | FOX Sports
thread.title_full: What to watch: Your weekend racing schedule | FOX Sports

author: Samuel Reiman
title: What to watch: Your weekend racing schedule | FOX Sports
text:
What to watch: Your weekend racing schedule Photos courtesy LAT Photographic, Supercross and NHRA. Feb 23, 2017 at 10:49a ET 0Shares 
This weekend is a huge one for motor racing, highlighted by the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series season-opening Daytona 500. 
Additionally, the NASCAR XFINITY Series and the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series will also be in action from the 2.5-mile Superspeedway in Daytona Beach, Florida. 
The Monster Energy Supercross series and the NHRA Mello Yello Drag Racing series are also in action this weekend with LIVE coverage of the Atlanta Supercross on Saturday, and three full hours of final eliminations coverage from the NHRA Arizona Nationals on Sunday. 
All times below ET and subject to change. All broadcasts will be simulcast on the FOX Sports GO app .
